div.p: Here are the many ways you can contact the team. Usually they will answer quite quickly, but if they don't please be patient and give them the benefit of the doubt. Yes that means stick around IRC longer than 2 minutes.
div.h4: This mailing list is for comments, criticisms and everything development related. Feel free to chime in!
div.p: We also have a forum Which is where you can talk, find answers and submit your creations.
